block.p: KLEIN-Madeline. July 8, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Irving. Cherished and inspirational mother to Judith and Gary Farber, and Rose and Sylvan Klein. Devoted and loving grandmother to Matthew Farber, and Joshua, Jessica and Alanna Klein. Dear sister to Jeanette. Loving aunt to Stephen, De and Robert Moss. Services are 1 PM, today, Mt. Pleasant Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. For information please call Robert Schoem's Menorah Chapel: 201-843-9090.
